title: Translation from ARM assembly to LLVM IR [closed]
content: Is there publicly available solution for translation of ARM assembly to LLVM IR?

comments.text: Have you considered reading the documentation of LLVM ?
Yes I did. Would you please try to be more specific ?

I mean, your question is bad. You did not even consider telling us what you already tried. You do not tell us in what your question is linked to reverse-engineering. It totally lack of context. Try to be a bit more explicit.
